page.title: 07CELEBRATIONS AND FESTIVALS
page.content: {Christmas.} Every year we have a Nativity Play. We have it in church. At the Christmas play we sing carols. There are decorations round the church. We have a party at school. We had a paper chain 46 metres long. We have games and crackers. We had ice cream and jelly. We can come in what we like to a Christmas party. Also we go home early. {Easter.} At Easter Time we have an egg rolling race and whoever wins gets the egg. We have a line made with chalk to start. You are not allowed to push your egg down the hill. Sometimes people give their egg two pushes. After we have had the race we all go round the back on the field and we have and egg hunt. We get little eggs and we put them into our baskets.
